title: Source of contract not found.
body:
### Component

Forge

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [ ] Foundry
- [ ] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

forge 0.2.0 (8055d57 2023-10-09T12:05:47.173940000Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

forge create

### Operating System

macOS (Apple Silicon)

### Describe the bug

On forge create ```src/SeaDrop.sol:SeaDrop``` I get the following errors:
```
[⠊] Compiling...
[⠒] Unable to resolve imports:
      "hardhat/console.sol" in "/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/src/GameOfLife.sol"
      "@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Base64.sol" in "/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/src/GameOfLife.sol"
      "@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol" in "/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/src/GameOfLife.sol"
      "@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol" in "/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/src/GameOfLife.sol"
      "@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Strings.sol" in "/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/src/GameOfLife.sol"
with remappings:
      ERC721A/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/lib/ERC721A/contracts/
      ERC721A-Upgradeable/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/lib/ERC721A-Upgradeable/contracts/
      ds-test/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/lib/ds-test/src/
      forge-std/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/lib/forge-std/src/
      murky/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/lib/murky/src/
      openzeppelin-contracts/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/
      openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/lib/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/contracts/
      operator-filter-registry/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/lib/operator-filter-registry/src/
      seadrop/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/src/
      solmate/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/lib/solmate/src/
      utility-contracts/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/lib/utility-contracts/src/
      create2-scripts/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/lib/create2-helpers/script/
      create2-helpers/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/lib/create2-helpers/
      erc4626-tests/=/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop/lib/operator-filter-registry/lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/erc4626-tests/
[⠆] Compiling 82 files with 0.8.17
[⠰] Solc 0.8.17 finished in 123.24ms
Error: 
Compiler run failed:
Error (6275): Source "@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol" not found: File not found. Searched the following locations: "/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop".
 --> src/GameOfLife.sol:5:1:
  |
5 | import "@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC721/ERC721.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Error (6275): Source "@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol" not found: File not found. Searched the following locations: "/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop".
 --> src/GameOfLife.sol:6:1:
  |
6 | import "@openzeppelin/contracts/access/Ownable.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Error (6275): Source "@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Strings.sol" not found: File not found. Searched the following locations: "/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop".
 --> src/GameOfLife.sol:7:1:
  |
7 | import "@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Strings.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Error (6275): Source "@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Base64.sol" not found: File not found. Searched the following locations: "/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop".
 --> src/GameOfLife.sol:8:1:
  |
8 | import "@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/Base64.sol";
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Error (6275): Source "hardhat/console.sol" not found: File not found. Searched the following locations: "/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop".
  --> src/GameOfLife.sol:11:1:
   |
11 | import "hardhat/console.sol";
   | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
```
Even though I installed these files, which reside in node_modules/@openzeppelin, using ```npm install @openzeppelin/contracts```. It's being looked in the wrong directory, ```/Users/zendevil/MetaverseX Dropbox/Prit Sharma/Mac/Documents/seadrop``` not in ```seadrop/node_modules/@openzeppelin.``` Not sure how to make it look for the sol files in that directory. I have experience using hardhat in which this is the way to do things. What am I doing wrong?
